ModMetaData.name: Natural Paths
ModMetaData.author: RadZerp
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod that adds paths for all biomes in vanilla + more! This mod is finished and all new content in the future will come as addons dependent on this mod. That way you don't have to worry about unexpected problems with your game.
Check out my addon: Natural Lakes
Stats - Cost: Nothing - Work to build: 150 (50% longer than concrete) - Walk speed: 100% - Flammability: 0% - Beauty: 0
